'''Pale hanging moss''' is a block found under the logs and leaves of [[pale oak]]s. When attached to a pale oak log or leaves, it emits ambient sounds.

== Obtaining ==
=== Breaking ===
Pale hanging moss can be broken instantly with any tool or by hand. It drops itself only when mined with [[shears]] or a tool enchanted with [[Silk Touch]], otherwise it drops nothing.

{{breaking row|horizontal=1|Pale Hanging Moss|drop=0|shears=1|link=none}}

=== Natural generation ===
Pale hanging moss generates under the leaves and logs of [[pale oak]]s in [[pale garden]]s. Pale hanging moss does not grow naturally after generating or being placed. Pale hanging moss does ''not'' generate as part of pale oaks grown from [[sapling]]s.

{{Block distribution}}

=== Post-generation ===
By applying [[Bone Meal|bone meal]] to pale hanging moss, the plant will grow one block longer at the bottom.

=== Trading ===
[[Wandering trader]]s may sell 3 pale hanging moss for 1 [[emerald]].
{{Trade sources}}

== Usage ==
=== Ambient sounds ===
Pale hanging moss emits subtle [[#Unique|atmospheric sounds]] when it is attached to [[pale oak leaves]] or a [[pale oak log]].

=== Composting ===
Placing pale hanging moss into a [[composter]] has a 30% chance of raising the compost level by 1.
